pullRequest.title: [BEAM-9928] Add qualified import name to task descriptors
pullRequest.bodyText:
Following up to this PR comment, this pull request adds a qualified import name to task descriptors.
I would like to request (R: @lostluck) and (R: @henryken) to review this.  If accepted, I will update the stepik course and commit the updated *-remote-info.yaml files to this PR for final merging into master.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.
